name: formwizard-react
description: A simple form validation library for React.js which wires up custom, controlled inputs through a declarative API.
author: @clocasto

scripts.cover:dev: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- tests && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.test-travis: npm run build:prod && npm run cover:prod
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && node node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src --out-dir dist/ --presets=es2015,react
